name: Gregory Wheelus
text: I ordered from a competitor in the area yesterday and had issues with contactless delivery. I have Pizza Hut a try today and they are on their game! Was thinking that the driver would want me to meet him in the hotel lobby; nope. Nothing short of perfection! Thank you Pizza Hut for the good work on keeping everyone safe!

name: Landon Lockhart
text: I really like this pizza hut. I think pizza hut in general is stepping up their game. Wish they had that old school cheese dip back for the breadsticks. But man they have all kinds of stuff to choose from. Not just pizza. Be sure to sign up for rewards. I get free wings nearly every order.
